data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Alderney, Guernsey with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Alderney, Guernsey
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Alderney, Guernsey to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Alderney, Guernsey that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Alderney, Guernsey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of St Anne
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of St Anne, Alderney, Guernsey.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Alderney, Guernsey a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Alderney, Guernsey know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Alderney with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.
